Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response:
I am able to take control of my learning more, as I can create specific GPTs within ChatGPT for each subject which uses the subject textbook as the basis of its knowledge and can teach me, quiz me and refine my skills.

Teachers especially within the university setting do not have the ability to do all of those things. Most times the lecture videos become to dull to watch by week 5 and hence I feel more interactive using other ways

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: The feedback by GenAI was more specific and did not make me self conscious and judged, as it is not human compared to when a teacher gives it

Question 42.Question: Describe any other differences between the feedback you received from GenAI and your teacher.
Question 42.Response: The teacher feedback is inherently going to be more useful as they are the ones marking and have more context on the subject and assignment compared to GenAi
